entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 09:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
